thread.section_title: Rover.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rover.com | rover.com
thread.title: Lisa

author: Lisa
title: Lisa
text:
I honestly thought this was too good to be true.
It was so easy and my dogs and I could not be happier with our experience :]
The family was fantastic and we totally didn't feel guilty about leaving our dogs behind. My 3 year old poodle would come from a local kennel that was very expensive and have nightmares after that I had to wake her from after a stay. But by leaving them with a family that I got to pick and interview I knew we would have a much better experience for our dogs. And they truly came home happy!!! My dogs are spoiled and are not use to being locked in a kennel at night and jailed. They are part of our family and sleep with us. It was fantastic to find a home away from home for a spoiled furry friends when we need to be away.
